document_data.name: Lifferlas
document_data.mainbody: '''Lifferlas''' was an [[awakened tree]] in [[Goldenfields]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
A druid of the [[Emerald Enclave]] gave life to Lifferlas. In time, he entertained children with tales of heroes and legends about gods.

In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], he was the oldest living sentient being in the place. He was in the town when [[giant]]s attacked the city.
document_data.Personality: He loved children and was truly happy when they carved their names into his body or hung from his boughs.
